attributes.action: Teach children how to act responsibly with firearms
attributes.additional_details:
With firearms becoming an ever-increasing concern in todays environment planning ahead may be a wise move.

Children see guns everywhere they go. The glorification of hollywood and video games means exposure to firearms is inevitable. Its on TV, in music and parents buy their children toy guns to play with. But does a 10 year old really know how much damage a gun can do? People talk about arming the police. If you give them guns then the criminals will arm themselves. Preevention may just be better than cure.
